Description:
Oversee daily laboratory operations, ensuring adherence to protocols and safety measures.
Manage laboratory staff, including training, scheduling, and performance evaluation.
Coordinate equipment maintenance and calibration.
Review and approve experimental procedures and results.
Ensure proper documentation and record-keeping of experiments.
Collaborate with researchers and scientists to support their work.
Implement quality control measures for reliable results.Skills
Skills:
Master's or Bachelor's degree in a relevant scientific field (Chemistry, Biology, etc.).
Experienced in pastry field from 1 to 3 years.
Previous experience in laboratory management or a related role.
Strong knowledge of laboratory procedures and safety protocols.
Proficiency in using laboratory equipment and software.
Leadership skills and the ability to manage a team of researchers or technicians.
Attention to detail and strong organizational skills.
